name: A "Half-Baked" Christmas Wisp
description:
A "Half-Baked" Christmas Wisp is a 2D endless runner inspired by The Running Dinosaur Game. The game was developed in 4 days and submitted to the 12 Devs of X-Mas Game Jam 2020, the theme being; Christmas Villains - It debuts as the first ever game jam entry developed under SelfMadeGames.

OBJECTIVES

Use the mouse cursor to destroy as many pesky elves as you can, whilst avoiding in-coming obstacles. Each elf killed will then be tallied to an overall score. But beware, the longer you live, the faster it gets!

MODES

X-Mas Mode: This classic mode ensures that the elf population remains steady and in control. 

A Elfin' Catastrophe Mode: The shackles are off - tis' the season of lovin'.

CONTROLS

The Wisp will follow the mouse cursor

MB1 - Interact with buttons

Work Times 

The jam consisted of a 3-4 day work time over the holiday period. Below are my working days.

DayDate121st Dec 222nd Dec329th Dec430th Dec

Assets

The art was created by in-house (you could most-likely tell), however the sounds were obtained from either 'freesound.org' or YouTube (Copyright free). Under the game jam rules, I have credited the owners below.  

AssetOwnerLinkJingle BellsKevin MacLeod

Message from the Developer!

Thanks very much for downloading my game! Any comments and or feedback will be greatly appreciated. Merry X-Mas and Happy New Year! P.S - Sorry if the music gets annoying... I may include a toggle in the future!
